learning_outcomes: Understand information at a train or bus station

content.stimulus_en: I buy my ticket at the bus ________. (estación)

content.prompt_es: ¿Es natural decir 'I am on the bus'?

content.stimulus_en:
A: Which platform for the London train?
B: Platform ________ 4. (número)

content.text: The next bus is in ten minutes.

content.stimulus_en: David is on the train. He sits by the window. He has a book in his hands. David opens the book and starts to read. The train is quiet. David likes reading. The book is about animals. David smiles as he reads. The train moves fast, but David is happy with his book.

content.prompt_es: Escucha y escribe lo que oyes:
content.stimulus_en: The train arrives at platform two.
content.correct_answer: The train arrives at platform two.

content.prompt_es: Escucha y escribe lo que oyes:
content.stimulus_en: I go to work by bus.
content.correct_answer: I go to work by bus.

content.prompt_es: Escucha y escribe lo que oyes:
content.stimulus_en: The next bus is in ten minutes.
content.correct_answer: The next bus is in ten minutes.

content.title: Pronunciación: Bus
content.instructions: Escucha y repite la vocal corta.

content.title: Pronunciación: Platform
content.instructions: Escucha y repite el acento de la palabra.

content.title: Pronunciación: Bicycle
content.instructions: Escucha y repite la pronunciación de 'bicycle'.

content.title: Pronunciación: Ferry
content.instructions: Escucha y repite enfocándote en la 'f' inicial.

questions.prompt_es: ¿La 'f' en 'ferry' es igual que en español?

content.title: Pronunciación: Motorbike
content.instructions: Escucha y repite la palabra compuesta.
